item.title: CentOS Frozen Package Update
item.description:
After installing a CentOS 7 system and updating the repositories, you usually need to update packages. However, for some reason, one of these times, a package decided to become corrupted. Specifically, the package initial-setup-0.3.9.30-1.el7.centos.x86_64.

When corrupted, during the process of cleaning up old versions after updating packages, it fails to delete itself, causing the update process to “freeze.” At this point, you might not know whether it is still working or has stopped.
